mapper.insert: insert into cn_user ( cn_user_id, cn_user_name, cn_user_password, cn_user_token, cn_user_nick, cn_qq ) values ( #{id }, #{name }, #{password }, #{token }, #{nick }, #{qq } )
mapper.select: select cn_user_id as id, cn_user_name as name, cn_user_password as password, cn_user_token as token, cn_user_nick as nick from cn_user where cn_user_id = #{id }
